detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
happythankyoumessage: Your audit inputs have been successfully recorded.
unhappythankyoumessage: Your audit inputs have been successfully recorded.
name: Audit name
identification_details: Where appropriate medications (Aspirin, Statins, Thienopyridines) administered prior to PTCA?
vital_signs: Was the door to balloon time in this patient </= 90 minutes?
surgery: Was the radial access used for PTCA in this patient?
complaints_communicated: Did this patient have an ISR (Instant Restenosis) requiring re intervention during admission?
intake: Did this patient have a vascular complication beyond the requirement of single compression at the puncture site?
output: Did this patient have any bleeding event requiring transfusion/ intervention within 72 hours?
allergies: Did this patient develop stroke after PTCA?
medication: Did this patient have to undergo an emergency CABG following a failed PTCA?
diagnostic: Did this patient have post procedure renal failure requiring haemodialysis?
lab_results: Did this patient have any delayed complication at the puncture site?
pending_investigation: Did this patient have any other procedure related complication?
medicine_order: Did this patient get discharged on the same day after PTCA
facility_communicated: How many days after admission did the patient get discharged?
urethral: Did this patient come for a review after 30 days of PTCA?
urine_sample: Did the patient have an MI within 30 days after the PTCA?
bystander: Did the patient have a repeat admission within 30 days of the PTCA?
instruments: Is the garbage/waste storage area protected from insects, pests, or rodent infestation?
sterile: Is garbage removed from the canteen in a timely manner?
antibiotics: Are records of food waste disposal maintained?
surgical_site: Are records of oil waste disposal maintained?
wound: Is a regular pest control program in place, and are records of the same available?
documented: Are products supplied by approved suppliers?
adequate_facilities: Are incoming food and supplies promptly inspected upon receipt?
sufficient_lighting: Are all food items, materials, and supplies immediately moved to appropriate storage areas?
storage_facility_for_food: Is all food labelled with the name and delivery/expiry date?
personnel_hygiene_facilities: Is food protected from contamination during the receiving process?
food_material_testing: Is there proper separation between food and chemicals in storage areas?
incoming_material: Is air-conditioned storage available where required?
raw_materials_inspection: Is all food stored off the floor?
raw_materials_cleaning: Are transport containers and carts regularly cleaned?
equipment_sanitization: Are proper temperatures maintained during transport for hot foods?
vegetarian_and_non_vegetarian: Are food handlers' medical checkup records up to date?
cooked_food_cooling: Is Food Safety training regularly provided?
food_portioning: Are food samples preserved for 24 hours?
